definition: relative purity of silver or gold/purity in carat weight/quality/fineness
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: It allows buyers and manufacturers to examine the colour of a material or the stitching on a garment.
sentences.chinese: 它让买家和制造商能检查原材料成色或衣服的针脚。

sentences.english: The principle of color generation and the theory of optical system design in color xerographic copiers are briefly described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 简述彩色静电复印机的成色原理和光学系统设计理论。

sentences.english: This was a harder-wearing alloy, yet it was still a rather high grade of silver.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种更耐磨的合金，同时仍含有高成色的银。

sentences.english: The relationship between molecular structures of the DIAR couplers and photographic characteristics is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 并探讨了DIAR成色剂分子结构和照相性能的关系。

sentences.english: The future developments of some new type of couplersare also described.
sentences.chinese: 并且对新型结构的青成色剂作了简要展望。

sentences.english: A method of printing with etched plates or cylinders ; intaglio printing.
sentences.chinese: 从半成色图版印刷有色复制品的方法。

sentences.english: Kodak company describes open chain reactive methylene two-equivalent yellow-forming conplers.
sentences.chinese: 柯达叙述了一种直链的活性亚甲基两当量的黄成色剂。

sentences.english: The quality of this pair of bloodstone bracelets is very good.
sentences.chinese: 这对鸡血石的镯子成色很好。

sentences.english: Aimed at improving the color durability of cyan dyes, new type of cyan coupler…
sentences.chinese: 作者预示了这两类成色剂的发展前景。

sentences.english: The determination of gold in alloy gold of low fineness by traditional fire assaying was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用传统的火试金法测定低成色合质金中的金。

sentences.english: Each gold grain is composed of many crystals (multi-crystal form) and has a higher purity.
sentences.chinese: 球粒均由多晶体组成，且成色极高。

sentences.english: To be fit for circulation the gold must be alloyed.
sentences.chinese: 为了适应流行，黄金也要降低成色。

sentences.english: Active coupler colouring agent to initiate the formation of colour after chemical action.
sentences.chinese: 活性成色剂化学作用后，引发颜色的色剂。

definition: condition/physical appearance (of a museum piece, item of food produced by a chef, postage stamp etc)
to cast (pour metal into a mold)
flat silver (former coinage)/also written 銀元|银元/silver dollar
to gild/(old) wages paid to a performer or a troupe by a theater
copper (pure copper, as opposed to alloy)
